mapper.insert: insert into restaurant (rid, rpassword, rname, rtitle, radress, rtel, rcategory) values (#{rid}, #{rpassword}, #{rname}, #{rtitle}, #{radress}, #{rtel}, #{rcategory})
mapper.select: select rid, rpassword, rname, rtitle, radress, rtel, rcategory from restaurant order by rtel desc limit #{startIndex1}, #{rowsPerPage1}
